trends: There has been one other sighting in Turner
There were no other sightings in Turner on or around September 30th 1994
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving into my yard,grandaugter saw it first,asked is that a planeI saw it and,said no it is not a plane.It was stationary.no pulsing lights.We sat in car watched the lights for a few minutes,I really wanted to go inside quickly.Wedid.We kept watching the lights for several minutes.Nothing changed.I called aneighbor to come up see the lights.He didnt arrive till long after the lightsdisappeared.The lights remained over the mountain for close to 20minutes,total.We didnt observe the lights continually,the last I observed,thegreen red lights left right of the brilliant white light,they went out.Thewhite light appeared to turn right,then when I looked again,it were gone.I had agreat deal of apprehension,but didnt want to scare my grandaughter.The red green lights seemed to glow upon the treetops below them.They were as big as thewhite light,but not so brillant,more of a glow.The wind was blowing hard,socould not hear any sound,that might have been made.I was returning from the Forddealership,because,my car had been recalled for a defect... I still have no ideawhat the lights were. I wish someone could tell me.Have seen none since.
